item.description:
Har gao! Shiu Mai! YÃ¼ Chi Gao!
Steamed buns! Sticky rice! Egg tarts and tea!
Chicken feet! Jellyfish!! Trrripe!!!

Join us for our now-monthly, all-social dimsum events, in Boston's Chinatown. We can talk geek, and eat ourselves silly.

Alas, this is probably not for the vegetarian'd, or the strictly kosher or halal, or the diet-conscious. The bill will be split evenly among all who attend, so the more the merrier/cheaper! (Cost is usually less than $15 per person.)

Directions here:
From Downtown Crossing (Red & Orange Lines):
Walk south on Washington Street or south on Chauncy Street.
Turn left on Beach Street, and then right on Tyler Street.

We'll meet on the sidewalk outside and proceed upstairs together. (The upstairs lobby gets packed)

NOTE IF YOU ARRIVE AFTER 1:15 -- will have probably gone upstairs at that point. If you've seen us before and can pick us out of the dining hall, come on up. If you're a newbie, there's really no easy way to find us.

For more information, see http://pam_phillips.h...

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Meetup!
